ERR_NO_TARGET: You don't seem to be referring to a user.
ERR_USER_NOT_FOUND: I can't seem to find this user
ERR_TARGET_IS_ADMIN: I really wish I could ban admins...
ERR_TARGET_ITSELF: I'm not gonna BAN myself, are you crazy?
MSG_BAN_SUCCESS: User in your Channel was banned from the group.
ERR_CONSOLE_CANT_BAN: ERROR banning user %s in chat %s (%s) due to %s
ERR_CANT_BAN: Well damn, I can't ban that user.
ERR_TEMPBAN_NO_TIME: You haven't specified a time to ban this user for!
MSG_TEMPBAN_SUCCES: Banned! User will be banned for {}.
ERR_KICK_TARGET_ADMIN: I really wish I could kick admins...
ERR_KICK_TARGET_ITSELF: Yeahhh I'm not gonna do that
ERR_CANT_KICK: Well damn, I can't kick that user.
ERR_KICKME_TARGET_IS_ADMIN: I wish I could... but you're an admin.
ERR_UNBAN_ITSELF: How would I unban myself if I wasn't here...?
ERR_UNBAN_NOT_BANNED: Why are you trying to unban someone that's already in the chat?
HELP:
- /kickme: kicks the user who issued the command

*Admin only:*
 - /ban <userhandle>: bans a user. (via handle, or reply)
 - /tban <userhandle> x(m/h/d): bans a user for x time. (via handle, or reply). m = minutes, h = hours, d = days.
 - /unban <userhandle>: unbans a user. (via handle, or reply)
 - /kick <userhandle>: kicks a user, (via handle, or reply)
